15532.content:
Hat-Kid’s adventures have taken her to all sorts places which she never imagined existing in the first place. She had dealt with the stingy Mafia, a crazy movie set with a convoluted plot, a spooky forest and a cruise with adorable but yet… clumsily seals.

But then she came across Nyakuza Metro. A whole city was populated with cat people!

It was huge, vast and beaming with life, as every street and corner there was something going on. But Hat-Kid needed to stay focus as she was still on the look-out for any missing Time Pieces (Or collectibles, but whatever…)

After running around the city for several minutes, she soon came across a timepiece that was just floating around in hand’s reach.

Mission accomplished! Let’s head on-

"That belongs to the boss!"

Hat-Kid stopped her celebration when she heard that statement. Holding the hourglass firmly in her hands, she looked behind her to find two cats approaching her.

And they didn’t look friendly.

Well for one, they were wearing masks and two, one of them was holding a baseball bat. Either they were late for a baseball game or Hat Kid had to be in the wrong place at the wrong time…

As Hat-Kid slowly backed away from the menacing cat duo, another voice suddenly spoke out.

"Thank you for bringing this to me.”

The hourglass was suddenly snatched from her hands, as Hat-Kid let out a surprised gasp and turned around to find another cat. A very tall cat compared to the rest of the cats she had seen around Nyakuza Metro. This one, in particular, wore a black fur-lined coat that ends in a deep red and various golden decals and decorations.

"So… Who do you work for?" she asked as she looked down at Hat-Kid with a smug but intrigued expression.

Hat-Kid (Who may or may not be mute, I don’t know…) decided to play along with the mysterious tall cat’s question and just shook her head sideways.

“No one?" she replied, her smug grin growing wider before patting Hat Kid’s hat a few times. "Well... I can't have you running around, interfering with my jewel business."

Hat-Kid was about to pull out her umbrella, expecting to be thrown into a boss battle of sorts before-

“So, starting today, you work for me now."

“Huh?” Hat-Kid muttered out in confusion. (HAH! She said something!)

Reaching deep into her pocket, the cat lady handed Hat-kid a… meaty burger and walked off down the street with her cat mooks. "Come by to my store, we have business to discuss." She waved as she continued onwards.

Hat-Kid looked in question before shrugging it off and decided to eat her ‘reward’. I mean, there was no point it going to waste. The sheer size was intimidating for sure, but it smelled so gooood~.

Oozing with grease and cheese between her fingers, Hat-Kid took a big bite out of it and moaned in delight from the taste. The gutsy kid quickly ate it up until she was left with grease stains on her fingers and her top.

Looking down the street where she saw the cat lady and her goons, Hat-Kid immediately ran off, hoping to catch up to them, figure out what they are doing with the timepieces and maybe… Get more of those burgers!

The Le Félin, a big jewellery store filled with all sorts of sparkling goodies and priceless items… Or so it may seem.

As Hat-Kid quickly figured out, that the cats she had encountered were involved in some crimes and some thefts. Another Mafia she had to deal with, which only made this whole situation more ironic than it should be. Regardless! If she wanted to get the timepieces back, she had to play along with them and join a gang of devious cats!

I mean, it can’t be that bad right?

“Ah, there you are.”

The tall cat from earlier came through a door and quickly locked it up as she made her way towards the cash register. “I see it didn’t take you very long to get here, allow me to introduce myself. I’m the Empress and I run this city… Don’t you forget it.”

Boy, that didn’t sound threatening at all…

Hat-Kid wiped the burger mess of her chubby face and gave the Empress a determine stare, showing she wasn’t gonna be intimidated like that.

The Empress simply grinned at that response and resumed speaking, "There's more of those hourglasses, I'm sure. You seem... talented at finding them."

Putting her elbows on the desk and resting her paws under her chin, as she leaned closer towards Hat-Kid, the Empress’ smile grew even wider as she continued. "Keep bringing them back here to me and I’ll keep rewarding you, and you keep bringing more. It's a simple arrangement, really~."

By bringing those timepieces back here, Hat-Kid could jeopardise her mission! But… those burgers… Those sweet, delicious meaty burgers…~

As Hat-Kid couldn’t help but drool at the thought of eating another of that delicious burger. The Empress chuckled at that response and snapped her fingers to get Hat-Kid to snap out of her little day-dream.

“First things first though, ditch those clothes. If you’re working for me, you’re going to dress the part. Luckily, my employees brought you the right uniform…” As she pointed her claw finger at the pile of clothes sitting on a nearby chair.

Spotting the clothes, Hat-Kid decided to ditch her trademark clothes for now and wear the appropriate clothes until all of this was over. Plus, her clothes were kinda dirty from that burger from earlier, but whatever…

Soon the adorable adventurer was wearing a nice purple jumpsuit that was sporting cat ears and cat mouth face mask.

The Empress clapped her paws in delight at what she saw and said, "You may wanna start looking around. I'm sure you can find your way. But before you go, this should get you motivated…"

With no hesitation, Hat-Kid dug into her burger and walked out of the store, leaving the Empress chuckle in a wicked manner.

Once again, Hat-Kid’s face was soon covered in grease once more as she ate her delicious treat. But unlike before, her body started to swell with fat with each bite she swallowed. Gradually becoming chubbier by the passing second, until she became an obese 280-pound little girl.

"Mmm… Yummy~!" Hat-Kid moaned as she finished eating it all. (What the heck, kid?)

The zipper of her new suit peeled down to reveal her basketball-sized gut that was trying to ooze out to escape, along with her perky grapefruit-size developing breasts. BBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!

Hat-Kid stopped what she was doing and saw the two cats she had encounter before step out from the crowd. Annoyed that they have been following her, Hat-Kid had no choice but to hand the timepiece to them.

“Thanks, kid, hope you got more room for another burger from the boss, hehe,” teased one of the cat lackeys.
